function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited use of hepa filters in non-healthcare occupational settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to maintain social distancing in small businesses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of physical barriers such as plexiglass, polycarbonate, and tempered glass in various industries and healthcare centers.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of administrative controls to minimize exposure to sars-cov-2 in workplace environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of personal protective equipment ppe to prevent the transmission of contagious diseases in workplace environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to use proper ppe","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper fit or seal of respirators","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on outdated guidelines for controlling covid-19 transmission in workplaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of expert team for the implementation of effective control measures in the workplace.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsanitary conditions in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and air circulation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unidentified symbols and characters could indicate potential security risks or data corruption.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unidentified text content","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation and air circulation in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of surface hygiene and cleaning protocols","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing and overcrowding","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex and ambiguous text with potential security risk in encoded parts.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Text mentions the spread of contagious diseases in built environments at all scales.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious transmission of coronavirus from animal to human","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmentally mediated transmission of covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupant density facilitates the accrual of human-associated microorganisms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased exposure risk associated with high occupant density and consistent contact demonstrated in covid-19 outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmissibility of covid-19 in confined spaces within the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of viral particles due to natural and mechanical airflow patterns in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transfer of viruses from individuals to surfaces and vice versa through contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination of fomites with sars-cov-2 particles from infected individuals and bodily secretions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 on different surfaces, indicating potential for fomite transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 through fecal-oral pathway","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of sars-cov-2 transmission through aerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases through droplets and aerosolization in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate filtration techniques for removing pathogens like sars-cov-2 from shared air environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of the sharing economy on infectious disease transmission in shared spaces such as coworking environments, homes, and transportation.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper handwashing and hygiene practices","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact and spatial proximity with infected persons","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use and handling of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding and implementation of environmental precautions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of sars-cov-2 risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for spread of sars-cov-2 in buildings due to viral particles associated with larger particles that can potentially penetrate high efficiency filters.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing outside air fractions may lead to increased energy consumption","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Not all air-handling systems have capacity to substantially increase outside air ratios","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High airflow rates without increased outside air fraction can increase transmission potential of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher rh decreases airborne dispersal of viral particles","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher humidity negatively impacts lipid-enveloped viruses through interactions with the polar membrane heads","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in humidity impact susceptibility to infection and viral particle deposition in the respiratory tract","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overhumidification increasing the potential of mold growth","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased rh may lead to increased buildup on filters, decreasing airflow","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
